originalText.text: Best doctor Hands down I've had 2 major surgerys with him on both my ankles I can walk again. Well versed in insurance and treatment never stuck with a bill because he explains your options.  Bedside manner is unmatched especially in today's doctor world. Truly blessed he's been my doctor for 4 years

originalText.text: Hands Down the Best podiatrist!!!! He has excellent bedside manners does not rush my appointment he explained exactly what's going on with my foot and was able to provide treatment therapy which healed my tendinitis. I am so grateful to Dr. Yagudayev he truly amazing, has hands of gold and one of kind. Thank you!!!

I am so grateful to Dr. Yagudayev he truly amazing, has hands of gold and one of kind. Thank you!!!

originalText.text: From my experience, Dr. Mathew Yagudayev is an extremely professional and talented podiatrist. He is very thorough, compassionate, and makes his patients feel like they are truly in competent hands. I could not have been happier with my choice. I recommend him to everyone.

text.text: From my experience, Dr. Mathew Yagudayev is an extremely professional and talented podiatrist. He is very thorough, compassionate, and makes his patients feel like they are truly in competent hands. I could not have been happier with my choice. I recommend him to everyone.

originalText.text: Had a great experience with Dr Mathew.  I had both a bunion surgery and cyst removal on my foot done at the same time. Both procedures have been very successful. I highly recommend him!  He’s very polite and thorough on each visit from the moment he explained the surgery procedure down to post op follow ups.

text.text: Had a great experience with Dr Mathew.  I had both a bunion surgery and cyst removal on my foot done at the same time. Both procedures have been very successful. I highly recommend him!  He’s very polite and thorough on each visit from the moment he explained the surgery procedure down to post op follow ups.

originalText.text:
Dr. Yagudayev is easily the best podiatrist that I’ve ever been to. He’s kind, takes time to listen and ask questions, will work with you on your issue, and is very knowledgeable too! Every visit I’ve had has been quick, easy, and at the same time never feels like I’m being rushed out either.

As someone who just moved to the area and was in search of new doctors across the board, I’m beyond happy that I’ve found such a great podiatrist in Dr. Yagudayev! In regards to the office, everyone working there has been very kind as well, and the waiting area feels extremely comfortable and calm too. Thanks for the great experience!
